articles.description: Watch live BBC coverage and follow live text updates as South Korea face Germany in Group H of the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up as South Korea face Germany

articles.title: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup - Morocco v Colombia in Group H

articles.description: Follow all the latest transfer news as Manchester City agree a £77m fee for Josko Gvardiol and reports suggest Kylian Mbappe is open to joining Chelsea on loan.
articles.title: Transfer latest: Gvardiol, Mbappe & Hojlund

articles.description: England hold their nerve to beat Australia for the first time at a Netball World Cup and finish top of Pool F in South Africa.
articles.title: England beat Australia in World Cup thriller

articles.description: Marcus Smith will start at fly-half for England against Wales in Cardiff on Saturday, with Ellis Genge captaining the side.
articles.title: Smith starts against Wales with Genge captain

articles.description: Cho So-hyun finishes off a wonderful team move to fire South Korea into an early lead against Germany at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Cho fires South Korea into early lead against Germany

articles.description: England defender Lucy Bronze says she can help keep Lauren James' "feet on the ground" and has formed a strong bond with the Chelsea star.
articles.title: Bronze vows to help James deal with limelight

articles.description: After following Chelsea on their pre-season USA tour, BBC Sport's Alex Howell looks at how Mauricio Pochettino's side are shaping up.
articles.title: Are Chelsea heading in the right direction?

articles.description: Watch highlights from the intense final quarter as England beat Australia for the first time ever at the Netball World Cup.
articles.title: England battle to win over Australia - highlights
